info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:01PM EDT until September 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTY AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Courtland, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Southampton County and the City of Franklin, including the following locations... Story and Handsom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
